targets.expr: count(mongodb_up{instance=~"$instance"})
min(mongodb_instance_uptime_seconds{instance=~"$instance"})
sum(mongodb_memory{instance=~"$instance",type=~"resident"})
sum(mongodb_memory{instance=~"$instance",type=~"virtual"})

sum by () (sum(mongodb_memory{instance=~"$instance",type=~"mapped|mapped_with_journal"}) or 
(sum(mongodb_ss_mem_mapped{instance=~"$instance"}) or 
sum(mongodb_ss_mem_mapped_with_journal{instance=~"$instance"})))

sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[5m]))

sum(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"} or
mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"} or
mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"})

sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance"})

sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[$interval]) or
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance",type!="command"}[5m]))

max(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) / 
(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) > 0) or
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) / 
(irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) > 0)
)

panels.description: TCP connections (Incoming) in mongod processes

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (instance) ((max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]))))

avg(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top 5 Connections

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state="current"}[5m]))

panels.description: Open cursors count

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (instance) ((mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"})))

avg(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"})

panels.title: Top 5 Total Cursors

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="total"})

mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or

mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"})

panels.title: Pinned Cursors

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="pinned"} or

panels.description: noTimeout cursors currently open

mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or

mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"})

panels.title: Top 5 noTimeout Cursors

targets.expr:
avg by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{instance=~"$instance", state="noTimeout"} or

panels.description: Average latency of (other) command operations

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (instance) ((rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) / 
(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) > 0) or
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) / 
(irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) > 0)
)))

avg(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) / 
(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[$interval]) > 0) or
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_latency_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) / 
(irate(mongodb_mongod_op_latencies_ops_total{instance=~"$instance",type="command"}[5m]) > 0)
)

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr:
min(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[5m])))

panels.title: Min Index Scanned Ratio

panels.description: Ratio of number of documents returned / index entries scanned

targets.expr:
max(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[5m])))

panels.title: Max Index Scanned Ratio

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned compared divided by sum of index entries scanned plus whole documents scanned.

targets.expr:
min(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or

avg(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state)

irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned compared divided by sum of index entries scanned plus whole documents scanned.

targets.expr:
topk(5,(sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})))

avg(sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"}))

panels.title: Top 5 Index Filtering Effectiveness

targets.expr:
sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})

sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance", type!="command"}[5m])) + 
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_repl_total{instance=~"$instance", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m])) +
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.description: Documents inserted, updated, deleted or returned per second.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top Document Operations

panels.description: Operations that are currently queued and waiting for read or write locks

targets.expr:
sum(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top Queued Operations

panels.description: Asserts. (Not a primary indicator of anything.)

targets.expr:
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_asserts_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or

irate(mongodb_mongos_asserts_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_asserts_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_asserts_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.description: This panel shows the actual number of documents that were affected on average during the given time period. A single *update* command for example could perform updates on hundreds or thousands of documents. If these counters seem high, you might want to check your statements to make sure they are properly operating against the documents that they should.

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (instance) ((rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance",state="deleted"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance",state="deleted"}[5m]))))

panels.description: This shows the number of read and write operations that are waiting due to for a lock. Consistently small values here should not be of concern, but if the values are consistently high the queries causing long lock times should be tracked down and fixed.

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (instance) ((max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance",type="reader"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance",type="reader"}[5m]))))

avg(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance",type="reader"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_global_lock_current_queue{instance=~"$instance",type="reader"}[5m]))
